document_data.name: Orcsblood
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Orcsblood''''' was a pirate ship captained by [[Ping]] that sailed the [[Moonsea]] in the mid–15th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The ''Orcsblood's'' captain and crew were known for their brutality, often slaughtering the entire crews of captured ships. In [[1460 DR]], the ''Orcsblood'' was destroyed by the [[Deva (aasimar)|devas]] [[Lakini]] and [[Lusk]].
